英文公告.機關名稱: Taiwan Power Company Third Nuclear Power Station
英文公告.機關地址: 387 Nan Wan Road, Hengchun Pingtung Hsien Taiwan, R.O.C.
英文公告.標案名稱: S/G ECT QDA Technical Service for Taiwan Power Company Maanshan Nuclear Power Plant Unit 1&2, EOC-20
英文公告.附加說明: 3.2 Tender's QualificationThe bidder shall be a MAANSHAN independent inspection company other than Taiwan Power Company and its contractor who perform primary, secondary, resolution or IQDA analysis of S/G ECT job. The bidder shall have Westinghouse Model F's or Model D's S/G ECT data analysis & data management experience. The experience list shall be submitted along with the proposal.3.2.1 An (1)ECT Level III QDA analyst assigned shall meet the personnel requirements as below : 3.2.1.1 Previous Westinghouse Model F's or Model D's S/G ECT data analysis experience.3.2.1.2 Submission of copies of the following documents along with the proposal for TPC MNPP' review and approval: A) Valid QDA (Qualified Data Analyst) licenses.B) Valid ECT Level III license with the personnel qualification and certification procedure which meet the requirements stated at ASME Boiler & Pressure Vessel Code Section XI (1998 edition or later), Paragraph IWA-2300.3.2.2 Two(2)ECT Level II QDA analyst assigned shall meet the personnel requirements as below : 3.2.2.1 Previous Westinghouse Model F's or Model D's S/G ECT data analysis experience.3.2.2.2 Submission of copies of the following documents along with the proposal for TPC MNPP' review and approval:A) Valid QDA (Qualified Data Analyst) licenses.B) Valid ECT Level II license with the personnel qualification and certification procedure which meet the requirements stated at ASME Boiler & Pressure Vessel Code Section XI (1998 edition or later), Paragraph IWA-2300.3.2.3 An(1) ECT Level III QDA data analysis and data managements person assigned shall meet the personnel requirements as below :3.2.3.1 Westinghouse Model F's or Model D's S/G ECT data management experience. 3.2.3.2 Submission of copies of the following documents along with the proposal for TPC MNPP' review and approval:A) Valid QDA (Qualified Data Analyst) license.B) Valid ECT Level III license with the personnel qualification and certification procedure which meet the requirements stated at ASME Boiler & Pressure Vessel Code Section XI (1998 edition or later), Paragraph IWA-2300.3.2.4 At least one (1) of the two(2) ECT Level III QDA analyst assigned and one(1) of the two(2) ECT Level II QDA analyst assigned shall have the experience of the X or Intelligent array probe data analysis.

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.13.31.83機關名稱：台灣電力股份有限公司第三核能發電廠
